definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
father's elder brother's wife/aunt (affectionate term for an elderly woman)
Matsu, name of a sea goddess still widely worshipped on the SE China coast and in SE Asia
adoptive mother (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)

sentences.english: If it's a letter from Mary, read it out, Mother.
sentences.chinese: 媽，如果是瑪麗的來信，就大聲念念吧。

sentences.english: How the hell is this a tech story?
sentences.chinese: 這他媽怎麼是個科技故事？

sentences.english: Ma, what present will you want for your birthday?
sentences.chinese: 媽，您生日時想要什麼生日禮物呀？

sentences.english: Mum, give me one hundred yuan.
I think that I never had any.
sentences.chinese: 我想我從來不曾有過媽。

sentences.english: Why don't you order that, Mom?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼不點那個呢，媽？

sentences.english: If not, can not want to marry you, mom, you must remember.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有，可甭想娶你，媽的話你可要記住了。

sentences.english: "How badly do you want him, Mom?" asks Michael.
sentences.chinese: 邁可問，“你想要得到這個人到了什麼程度，媽？”
媽爲了一件風衣在殺價。

sentences.english: "Mom, you must have been terribly bored staying at home when I was a child, " I said.
sentences.chinese: 媽，我小的時候，您老呆在家裏一定覺得很煩吧？

sentences.english: Sueook at that lovely fur coat, mum.
sentences.chinese: 媽，看那件漂亮的裘皮大衣。

sentences.english: The mother, their this is in the shadowboxing ?
As if to be rid of her, Ma handed Sadie a broom.
sentences.chinese: 好像要支開她似的，媽遞給莎蒂一個掃帚。

sentences.english: Mom, I heard that there were many fire disasters by burning "paper money" on tomb-sweeping day last year.
sentences.chinese: 媽，我聽說去年清明節燒紙錢發生了很多火災。

definition: see 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5]
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to press charges/to file a complaint
so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
Nyima county, Tibetan: Nyi ma rdzong in Nagchu prefecture 那曲地區|那曲地区[Na4 qu3 di4 qu1], central Tibet
plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals
